text: Kardashian - obsessed Jennifer Lawrence is starting to overstep her boundaries on Kim ‘ s clan — so much so it ’ s sent the reality star into a “ jealous rage, ” RadarOnline. com has learned exclusively! The mother - of - two, 37, is said to be envious “ as hell ” over the hold Lawrence, 27, has on her infamous momager Kris Jenner. “ She ’ s waltzing into the family ’ s world acting like a superstar and upsetting the order with her loud chaos.
